pages.text: It is just and proper for me that I say about Allah nothing but the Truth. I have come to you indeed with evidence from your Lord. So send the Children of Israel with me
He [Pharaoh] said, "If you have come with a sign, then come out with it, if you are of the truthful ones
So he [Moses] threw down his staff, when, lo and behold, it was a veritable serpent
And he stretched his hand, when, lo and behold, it was shining white to the onlookers
The chieftains among Pharaoh's people said, "This one is indeed an expert magician
He intends to drive you out of your land. What counsel do you then give
They said, "Defer the matter concerning him and his brother, and send callers into the cities and towns
to bring to you every expert magician
And the magicians came to Pharaoh and said, "We should indeed have a reward if we are the victors
He said, "Yes, and you shall indeed be of those who are close
They said, "O Moses! Either you do the throwing down, or we do it
He said, "You throw!" So when they did, they hoodwinked the people's eyes and frightened them, and they displayed some great magic
And We revealed Our instruction to Moses, "Throw down your staff." And, lo and behold, it swallowed up what they had conjured up
So the truth prevailed, and what they did became null and void
They were thus defeated there, and they turned back subdued
